content: emilia is the sixth floral granny square in the welcoming blanket 1 a mystery crochet along for a throw blanket made up of nine 12 floral granny square patterns with borders emilia has an 8-petal flower at the center which is inspired by the petals on flower garden square x by margaret hubert 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch treble_crochet crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop only includes a link to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces crocheting in the front loop crocheting in the third loop includes video tutorials special stitch pattern decrease includes written instructions and link to photo tutorial in pattern special stitch patterns fpdc fpsc puff includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 12 30 5 cm square **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *approximately 60 yd 55 m in ca 40 yd 36 5 m in cb and 70 yd 64 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* clover amour us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle **gauge** motif = 12 30 5 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/05/24/welcoming-blanket-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2017/06/09/crochet-pattern-flower-garden-square-x/ 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/07/06/crochet-pattern-emilia-floral-granny-square/
